about_the_game:
MixoGames presents Twistingo: Collector’s Edition, a charming tropical adventure of fun in the sun!

A remote destination in the Pacific Ocean was recently hit by a tropical storm, and they need your help rebuilding. Join your local contact, Enoha, in his mission to recover the missing tiki masks that protect the island from the fury of its evil spirits. Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Each step gets you closer to recovering the missing artifacts and restoring the island to its natural beauty. Are you up to the challenge? Then get ready for the captivating, genre-blending puzzles in Twistingo!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

  • 15 Bonus story mode levels to continue your adventure!
  • 9 extra levels for free play mode!
  • 9 extra randomly generated levels in infinite mode!
  • 3 mini-game modes to earn extra coins!
  • Music player and more!

Each step gets you closer to recovering the missing artifacts and restoring the island to its natural beauty. Are you up to the challenge? Then get ready for the captivating, genre-blending puzzles in Twistingo!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12.4/11.6/10.15
  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 653 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12.4
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1750 MB available space

name: Twistingo Collector's Edition

  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
